A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
There are some really great action scenes\, special effects masterfully displayed\, and excellent actors\, props\, set design\, cgi\, and more\, lets not forget characters and story-lines that everyone wants to see played out. None of that really matters though\, because its a mess of an addition to the star wars legacy of films.

The movie is worth seeing\, there are some great scenes\, but the cringe worthy awkward jokes\, and strange character development really will leave you at a loss for words. If you like to watch films and don't care about stories\, then this should hit the spot.

If your a die hard star wars fan\, or like to think about your films\, and want to see the legacy of Skywalker\, and how it all works out\, this is a nightmare\, one we will never wake up from\, the damage is done\, and we will never again have this once in a life time chance.

This film will become dated\, it feels rushed\, but it has some nice action scenes.

The amount of time that it would take to extract everything that didn't make sense in this movie would be longer than the film itself.
